3 years ago I deleted all my social media accounts.

Amazingly, I got my life back.

I am new to Gab as I am sick and tired of censored sites for those of us having conservative viewpoints and life-style. I am hoping to meet those of like mind and philosophy.

Cheers all:)

post.body:
Red Planet, Red Moon, and Mars  
August 9, 2018

The Red Planet shines brightly at the upper left of this gorgeous morning twilight view from Mornington Peninsula, Victoria, Australia, but the Moon and Earth look redder still. Taken on July 27, the totally eclipsed Moon is setting. It looks reddened because the Earth's umbral shadow isn't completely dark.
post.body_html:
Red Planet, Red Moon, and Mars
August 9, 2018

The Red Planet shines brightly at the upper left of this gorgeous morning twilight view from Mornington Peninsula, Victoria, Australia, but the Moon and Earth look redder still. Taken on July 27, the totally eclipsed Moon is setting. It looks reddened because the Earth's umbral shadow isn't completely dark.

group.title: Photography
group.description:
Connecting Gab's professional & amateur photographers with photo enthusiasts in the #GabFam.
Please, signify originals. Mark sensitive/graphic content as "NSFW". Want to share numerous photos (3 or more)? Upload them in 1 post. Videos also welcome. We delete spam & spammers. 

Thanks!

post.body:
. @RealAlexJones gets banned from almost everywhere. 

Gab of course welcomes him.

Next day: Gab CEO‚Äôs house almost burns to the ground.

Day after: Microsoft threatens to shut Gab down.

Day after that: Youtube removes Alex Jones interview of Gab CEO. 

Coincidence.

post.body:
Free speech means you can offend, criticize, and make memes about any race, religion, ethnicity, or sexual orientation. 

Sick and tired of the double standards for ‚Äúacceptable speech‚Äù and ‚Äúprotected classes‚Äù on both the left and the right. 

Free speech for ALL about ALL.
